author: sky.cactus
content: <@!364458974906548225> Anything I can do to help facilitate 4byte.directory getting its certificate issue fixed?  I have a little tool that uses it via API and it is currently broken due to the TLS certificate tissue.

author: pipermerriam
content: I almost had it this afternoon but ran into some certbot issues and then got rate limited. Should have it back up tonight or tomorrow morning

author: pipermerriam
content: (if it is not back up by mid day us time tomorrow you can help by pestering me about it one more time)

author: pipermerriam
content: should be back up now and I got a cronjob setup that should autorenew my cert going forward.
